price: Deε aka a monsa nnya nnkaeε no Onyankopͻn atwa ho nyinaa ahyia (anaasε Onim). Onyankopͻn na Ɔwͻ tumi wͻ biribiara soͻ.
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad aḥāṭa al-lahu bihā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
